title: Rebuilding Puerto Rico Efficiently and Accountably – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
April 4, 2019
The Puerto Rican people have tremendous spirit. When I was there and I looked at the way that — what they have to go through. They have a lot of problems. We’re going to help them straighten it out.
						President Donald J. Trump					SWIFT AND HISTORIC RESPONSE: The Trump Administration acted swiftly in response to Category 5 Hurricane Maria, providing billions in Federal aid to help rebuild Puerto Rico.  PROTECTING SURVIVORS AND TAXPAYERS: The President is committed to protecting the survivors and taxpayers from mismanagement and corruption.EXTENSIVE HISTORY OF MISMANAGEMENT AND CORRUPTION: Puerto Rico officials has a long history of financial mismanagement and corruption. CONTINUED SUPPORT: The Trump Administration continues to work with Puerto Rico on a plan to spend the money that is currently available to it.
